content: rs purl on row 3 k5 work row 3 of chart over next 8 stitches ws *knit to 1 stitch before next marker m1r k1 work chart bind off and turn hem under folding at yo row sew over next 8 stitches k1 m1l repeat from * 3 more times neatly down on back side knit to next marker work row 3 of chart over next 8 stitches k5 garter stitch hem you ve worked 4 sets of increases 8 stitches increased work 4 garter ridges when working flat for body of total in row 3 be sure not to increase on either side of the sweater knit every row for 8 row when working in the button band - only at the ragaln markers round for sleeves knit 1 row purl 1 row for 8 row bind off in purl on rs © tanis fiber arts 2018 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only www tanisfiberarts com
